roleset.name: not smart or wise

role.descr: thing that is stupid (might require concatenation- see exs)

example.name: both args, empty it
example.text: It was stupid of him to go to the store without a list.
example.arg: to go to the store without a list.

example.name: focus on him
example.text: He was stupid to go to the store.

example.name: alternate focus
example.text: Going to the store was stupid of him

example.name: all constituents present without concatenation
example.text: His going to the store was stupid

example.name: arg1 and ADV
example.text: But people can be stupid about money without being stupid about everything else
example.arg: without being stupid about everything else

roleset.note: STUPID-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on WSJ data. (from stupid.01-j)
